product_name: Columbia Silver Ridge III Convertible Pants - Boys'
long_description: Designed for comfort in a wide variety of conditions, the boys' Columbia Silver Ridge III Convertible Pants feature zip-off legs and light, durable, quick-drying fabric with built-in sun protection. Tough nylon fabric with Omni-Wick(R) treatment pulls moisture away from the skin and speeds drying. Omni-Shade(R) fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Zip-off legs quickly convert pants into shorts with an 8 in. inseam. The Columbia Silver Ridge III Convertible Pants feature an internal adjustable waistband that ensures a perfect fit.
